text: The Secret War of Harry Frigg is a 1968 American World War II comedy movie directed by Jack Smight and starring Paul Newman, Sylva Koscina, Andrew Duggan, Tom Bosley, John Williams, Charles Gray, Vito Scotti, Werner Peters, Buck Henry. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1968 comedy movies Category:1960s war movies Category:American war movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Jack Smight Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in Italy
title: The Secret War of Harry Frigg
